Posts.Content: Zoe-Lily wrote: Hi, I will be starting radiation in couple of weeks , I am very nervous  on  about what to expect  (if it is going to hurt , sores and other side effects) . Can you ladies please share your experience on what I need to be watch out for? Many Thanks, Zoe Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Radiation - Starting soon Zoe-Lily Zoe-Lily

Posts.Content: Feb 3, 2012 07:50PM - edited Feb 4, 2012 07:53AM by Moderators Ladies I am not stage 4 , so I apologize for posting on this forum. Reading formygirls post brought tears to my eyes. I went on net to research some positive stories to share with formygirlds those with similar diagnosis like her. Formygirls, please check this below link.. there are many brave ladies with mets and TNBC getting by and living healthy. Passing this link with warm hugs .. https://www.inspire.com/groups/advanced-breast-cancer/discussion/stage-4-triple-negative-5-year-survivors/ Lily Edited by Mods to make the link hot.
Posts.Title: HELP. Just diagnosed today--lung, liver and bone mets formygirls Heidihill
